All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractCrudService<R,T,ID>
Generic abstract service that delegates CRUD operations to a repository (composition).
AlertHelper
Small, instantiable helper for showing JavaFX alerts — no static methods here.
BaseEntity
Abstract base for JPA entities with a Long identifier and proxy-safe equals/hashCode implementations.
CategoriesView
Controller for the Categories screen.
Category
Simple category entity (unique, normalized name).
CategoryCreate
A compact DTO used when creating or renaming a category.
CategoryRepository
Repository for Category entities built on top of HibernateRepository.
CategoryRow
UI-friendly table row for categories.
CategoryServiceImpl
Final service implementation for working with Category entities.
CrudRepository<T,ID>
Generic persistence port (no dependencies on the control/service layer).
CrudScreen<R,ID>
Plug-and-play base class for any “Table + CRUD” screen.
Deadline
Deadline/bill entity representing a single due item in the ledger.
DeadlineCreate
A compact DTO used to create a deadline (a due item such as a bill or charge).
DeadlineRow
UI-friendly row for the deadlines table (no static methods here).
DeadlineServiceImpl
Deadline service: CRUD operations plus an atomic toggle and a simple view projection.
DeadlinesView
Controller for the Deadlines screen.
FilterMode
Filter modes to compare a date against “today”.
FormData
Form DTO for the Transactions view (kept as a separate record).
FormHelper
Instantiable helper for form handling (no statics).
FxAlerts
JavaFX-backed implementation of UiAlerts.
HibernateRepository<T,ID>
Generic Hibernate-backed repository implementing CrudRepository.
HibernateUtil
Bootstrapper and singleton accessor for the application's SessionFactory.
ICategoryService
Service contract for working with Category entities.
ICrudController<R,ID>
Generic contract for table-based CRUD screens.
ICrudService<T,ID>
Minimal CRUD service.
IDeadlineService
Service contract for deadlines.
Identifiable<ID>
Objects that expose a technical identifier.
ITagService
Service interface for managing Tag entities.
ITransactionService
Service contract for working with Transaction aggregates.
IViewController
Minimal contract for all view controllers.
MainApp
JavaFX application entry point.
MovementRow
UI-friendly row for the movements/transactions table (no static methods).
Named
Objects that expose a human-readable name.
NavigationService
Tiny navigation helper for switching between JavaFX scenes.
NavTarget
Navigation targets for the application.
ServiceFactory
Super-simple service factory providing lazily-created singletons.
StatisticsView
Controller for the Statistics screen.
Tag
Free-form tag entity, unique by normalized name.
TagServiceImpl
Tag service: CRUD plus case-insensitive lookup using the JPA Criteria API (DB-agnostic).
TopBarView
Controller for the top navigation bar.
Transaction
Financial transaction entity representing either an income or an expense.
TransactionCreate
A compact DTO used to create a transaction without any dependency on JPA entities.
TransactionRepository
Repository for Transaction built on top of HibernateRepository.
TransactionServiceImpl
Transaction service: application boundary decoupled from the UI (no entities inside DTOs).
TransactionsView
Controller for the Transactions screen (table + simple form).
TransactionType
Kind of financial transaction — the direction of the money flow.
TrendTabView
Controller for the Trend tab.
TxFilter
Tiny value object that groups query criteria for retrieving transactions from a repository.
UiAlerts
Minimal alerting contract for UI layers.
